snippet: Andy Murray won his first match since adding Amélie Mauresmo as his new coach, beating Paul-Henri Mathieu, 6-4, 6-4, in the second round of the Queen’s Club grass-court tournament.
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray won his first match since adding Amélie Mauresmo as his new coach, beating Paul-Henri Mathieu, 6-4, 6-4, in the second round of the Queen’s Club grass-court tournament.

headline.main: Murray Wins First Match Since Adding New Coach
